data.title: Successful Results for Clients With IBM
data.meta_description: Infosys is an IBM Premier Partner with a deep understanding of the complete IBM technology portfolio, delivering best-in-class solutions across many years.
data.text:
Automation

Infosys and IBM drive business transformation to support acceleration of digital computing by fostering a co-creation environment with pre-built industry-specific solutions, platforms, and frameworks to enable new capabilities and rapid innovation to help clients:

Scale their processes for superior customer experience and operational outcomes

Drive visibility and insight to enable faster enterprises decision making, and shifting from reactive to proactive posture resulting in application performance and business availability; and

Accelerate enterprise cloud adoption journey with cloud resource optimization – a continuous process, reducing overall cloud spend by identifying mismanaged resources, eliminating waste, and right sizing computing services to scale.

Infosys has established industry-leading methodologies, frameworks, best practices, and delivery models across a wide range of automation capabilities—capture, content, decisions, process modelling, process mining, and workflow to re-engineer core business processes and simplify them. By integrating IBM's Cloud Pak for Automation platform strengths with comprehensive automation technologies, AI, and our low-code solutions, Infosys provides tailored and exclusive digital business automation solutions, helping Enterprises achieve superior business outcomes, build and scale business applications, apply digital intelligence, and streamline operations.

IBM Cloud Pak for Business Automation - Strategy & Process Consulting

Employing an immersive 3D approach, our Process and Automation Consulting Experts construct comprehensive, accurate, and fact-based Process Transparency to profile intuitive and predictive process models and recommend automated process enhancements.

Our advisory and planning services help organizations in becoming forward-thinking, adaptable, and digitally competitive with the adoption of a wide range of technologies including but not limited to Process Mining, Automated Business Process Discovery, Task Mining, AI, ML-driven Insights and Decisions, Digital Twins, Workflow Automation, RPA, Intelligent Document Processing, Data Sensing, and Enterprise Content Management.

IBM Cloud Pak for Business Automation – Implementation and Innovation

Infosys DPA uses an industrialized rapid implementation method powered by automation that is tailored specifically for IBM Cloud Pak for Automation platform and implement programs encompassing Business Automation Studio, Business Automation Workflow (BAW), Business Automation Insights (BAI), Process Mining, and Cloud Pak integrations. With the methodology, we aim to provide customers with speed, scale repeatability, de-risked, and cost-effective execution. We accelerate our customers' digital engagements by fostering a co-creation environment with pre-built industry-specific solutions, platforms, and frameworks to enable new capabilities and rapid innovation.

Infosys and IBM provide customers with applications and services to gain a holistic understanding of their IT investment and to adopt business management practices in technology that give them the power to find cost savings areas, enhance planning and forecasting, and optimize their spending through on-premises and cloud-based investments. IBM Apptio platforms provide Infosys products and services with an IT financial management engine. Our collaboration offers a range of products and solutions that foster innovation and accelerate the digital transformation of the IT Operating Model. Our joint offerings give customers financial trust that their current and future IT investments are consistent with the business plan and priorities for operational excellence. Offerings cover on-site and cloud spending and more significantly strengthen the management of digital transformation with a better view of spending as customers increase their cloud investment.

Infosys provides integration solutions leveraging IBM technology product to design and implement reusable, extensible and scalable integrations to meet the current and future business requirements, better customer experience by continuous development and usage frameworks for continuous deployment and integrations to meet the business demand. Infosys and IBM have a deep partnership spanning across integration services like Consulting, Architecture and Delivery. In the capacity of a consulting partner, IBM has been involved in the areas of Architecture, Evaluation, Industry Trends, Frameworks and Solutions, Best Practices. In terms of Architecture Infosys has leveraged and engaged with IBM for Research, POC, Solution Accelerators, Design, Technology Governance & Support and Technology Reference Architecture. The partnership has also extended to providing delivery solutions through the Integration Competency Centre, IBM Integration Solution Delivery, Training & Certifications and Knowledge Management.

Across Infosys Services, we have extensive experience and expertise in implementing IBM technology products for business process automation, IT operations and automation, AIOps and integration solutions. Infosys Equinox, our human-centric digital commerce and marketing platform uses IBM Instana and Grafana tools for Application and Infrastructure monitoring to track performance of the software used in our microservices-based product architecture. Infosys has created innovative and market leading solutions, part of Infosys Cobalt, leveraging IBM technology platforms and products to include Cloud Pak for Business Automation, Cloud Pak for Integration, watsonx Orchestrate, Business Automation Workflow (BAW), Operational Decision Manager (ODM), Workflow Process Services (WfPS), Datacap, Filenet Content Manager, Content Manager OnDemand, Enterprise Records, App Connect Enterprise, MQ, DataPower, API Connect, Instana, Turbonomic, Watson AIOps, Apptio, Instana, and Turbonomic.

Reference IBM Automation Platform for more information.

Infosys BPM Digital

Our Service Offerings

Infrastructure

Infosys and IBM focus areas include:

Application modernization – delivering next-generation modernized, future-ready applications; and

Infrastructure modernization – Digital transformation helping organizations modernize and extend application and data real estate infrastructure to create new value.

Infosys helps enterprises take advantage of the cloud to realize business benefits, including:

Enabling enterprises to assess their current state and suggest the best way forward

Helping enterprises adopt cloud and take advantage of the benefits of cloud computing; and

Modernizing and re-architecting enterprises’ applications to cloud native services

Leveraging Infosys Cobalt, a set of services, solutions and platforms for enterprises to accelerate their cloud journey, along with IBM’s deep technical capabilities, we have helped clients accelerate their cloud journey. Infosys is the first global systems integrator to join IBM’s Hybrid Cloud ecosystem to help enterprises including those in highly regulated industries such as financial services, insurance, and healthcare - to transition, modernize, and transform their enterprise workloads and applications by tapping into the security, open innovation, and enterprise capabilities of the IBM Cloud.

IBM Platform and Consulting organizations have been partners of Finacle, a digital banking platform, for more than 20 years. Between Finacle and IBM, we ensure banks transform and bring modernized solutions to our customers. In fact, the first Finacle implementations were deployed on IBM Power and the extensive Finacle portfolio of solutions are also deployed on IBM Z Mainframe and LinuxOne platforms. Finacle and IBM LinuxONE deliver an industry leading core banking solution on a highly reliable platform series offering benefits of reliability, improved performance, cloud readiness, scalability, and high processing power to banking clients. Additionally, IBM Consulting have over a few hundred consultants enabled to implement and deliver Finacle solutions. IBM Consulting and Finacle collaborate to help banks modernize their operations and provide better services to their customers. Banks can leverage Finacle’s industry leading Core banking solution and IBM Consulting’s expertise across Strategy, Experience Design, Technology and Operations for accelerated banking transformations. Together we are committed to help banks innovate, operate, and transform better through our integrated consulting, services and hardware and software technology solutions. To learn more about the IBM and Finacle partnership or solutions offered, contact us at Finacle_Alliance@Infosys.com.

Infosys have deep skills in IBM technology products and infrastructure to include IBM Cloud, LinuXONE, Power, Storage, Z, and Z software.
